seo.title: Tokenomics — $PC Value Accrual & Economics
seo.description: How $PC captures value: settlement-driven demand, usage-based sinks (burns/locks), staking economics, and the supply schedule.
seo.og-description: Settlement in $PC drives demand; usage-based sinks reduce supply. Includes staking economics and emissions.
